import React from 'react'; import { Link, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; const Navbar = ({ isLoggedIn, user, onLogout }) => { const location = useLocation(); const navItems = [ { path: '/', label: 'Home', icon: 'üè†' }, { path: '/simulation', label: 'Simulation', icon: 'üéØ' }, { path: '/quiz', label: 'Quiz', icon: 'üìù' }, { path: '/dashboard', label: 'Dashboard', icon: 'üìä' }, { path: '/leaderboard', label: 'Leaderboard', icon: 'üèÜ' }, { path: '/threats', label: 'Threats', icon: 'üåê' }, { path: '/cyber-health', label: 'Cyber Health', icon: 'üõ°Ô∏è' }, { path: '/awareness-video', label: 'AI Video', icon: 'üé¨' }, { path: '/admin', label: 'Admin', icon: '‚öôÔ∏è' } ]; return (
üõ°Ô∏è
CyberSecurity Training CyberSec
{navItems.map((item) => ( {item.icon} {item.label} ))} {isLoggedIn ? (
Welcome, {user?.name}
) : (
Login Register
)}
{/* Mobile menu button */}
); }; export default Navbar;
